page.title: 02SALFORD PRIORS VILLAGE
page.content: Salford Priors is an old village mentioned in the first Domesday Book . It is midway between Evesham and Stratford Upon Avon. In Salford Priors there is a church,one school,two shops,Park Hall,a Youth Club,a playing field and a Village Hall.There are many types of houses in Salford Priors. There is a church in Salford Priors called St.Matthews.There is a Youth Club for children over 10 years old,and it takes place on Monday. There is a small school in Salford Priors which has 83 pupils from 4 to 11 years.There are two shops, one of them is a General Store and the other one is a Post Office. The Memorial Hall or Village Hall is used by the W.I. and the Play Group but is being used less and less by village organisations.
